review_blob: I didnt think that they could improve their IPA much but they did! This imperial IPA is in my top 3 favorite IPAs

slightly piney, very bitter, strong citrus taste. This is IPA at its best. This is in my top 3 IPAs, and I am an IPA snob. being a snob I wont look this horse in the mouth, just know that  It is a great beer good example of the style.
beer_name: Widmer Brothers Rotator IPA Series - Shaddock IPA

review_blob: Good head,  laces nice,  pours cloudy amber.  English malts and crystal hops balance nicely.  Really good for those that have an aversion to overwhelming hoppy taste or bitter citrus typical of the style.  Highly recommend.  Sweet grapefruit finish without the bitter citrus peel taste.  Very different,  mellow,  balanced IPA
beer_name: Rogue Nation Brutal India Pale Ale

review_blob: Pours a burnt sugar color,  not much head. Great even aroma,  Very good citrus taste.  Represents the style nicely. They changed recipes recently and I say they have a winner now. In fact I was so pleased I grabbed a Growler of it

cool bottle. Great aroma, initial hoppy taste followed by a strong crisp citrus finish that eventually fills your whole mouth after a bottle or two. My advice- FIND this beer and try it! this is my favorite beer

honestly, I am not sure that in a blind taste test that I would be able to differentiate this beer from soda water or even a glass of purified water with an alka seltzer tab fizzing in it. No exaggeration.

Kind of disappointed in this beer since it is so widely hailed as a model beer. Watery and not much taste, so mellow in fact that i would have sworn it was made in the States and sold matching flip flops and hats. Not impressed sorry everybody
